_sText:
Hi First I want to thanks ace of spaces who is the original author of the map, two years ago I fall in love and started to work in three versions.
Today i'm glad to present to you the v3 after one year with the v2.
The v3 add four new games to the map, fix others and add features which impact in the gameplay
Games:

-Skiping rope:
Discover a new style of skiping rope with an hardcore one, you have 3speed and 3 blade.
All is securized to make sure noone will kill all T by use a button.
-Maze:
In each maze I saw in Jailmaps there was only one way to end, so after 4-5try the winners were thoses who run the faster and maze became race.
I introduce a new kind of maze: you have to find an item in the maze. It will spawn randomly in a two level unreal like with monsters and trap available.
-Human tetris:
Because japanese make us laught I give them a tribute.
The T team have to pass into hole symbolise by a character. You can personalise each game with three levels, hot lava and cage.
-Climb:
Cause now the players of my team will say race for the race and no more climb!
A simple game, no entities just a climb.

Features:

I add a lotto, each round will be different:
20% the two races are unavailable
20% tetris and fork game are unavailable
20% climb and skiping rope are unavailable
40% Surprize event!
This mechanic require the warden to change games and make a break in the monotony.
some of the events make the round end in the two first minutes. I add more guns, because in our team we think T must have the weapons to be able to make a rebellion we also think they need to deserve it.
So T will find heavy weapons with magasines but only in the wardens blocks, it will never on the way of the games.
The map was released the 04july so if you find bugs, plz notify them here :)
Sorry for my bad english
Wylloh
Supreme Elite
87.98.190.51:27015
